00015 /**
00016  * dispatcher. this is the first thing that is constructed.
00017  * the dispatcher then collects all parameters given via get/post and instanciates the right controller
00018  * @package kata_internal
00019  */
00020 class dispatcher {
00021     /**
00022      * placeholer-array for all relevant variables a class may need later on (e.g. controller)
00023      * [isAjax] => false (boolean, tells you if view got called with /ajax/)
00024      * [url] => Array (
00025      *       [url] => locations
00026      *       [foo] => bar (if url read ?foo=bar)
00027      * )
00028      * [form] => Array (
00029      *    (all post-variables, automatically dequoted if needed)
00030      * )
00031      * [controller] => main (name of the controller of this request)
00032      * [action] => index (name of the view of this request)
00033      * @var array
00034      */
00035     public $params;
00036 
00037     /**
00038      * name of the current controller
00039      * @var string
00040      */
00041     public $controller;
00042 
00043     /**
00044      * time in us the dispather started (used to calculate how long the framework took to completely render anything)
00045      */
00046     private $starttime;
00047 
00048     /**
00049      * constructor, just initializes starttime
00050      */
00051     function __construct() {
00052         $this->starttime = microtime(true);
00053     }
00054 
00055     /**
00056      * destructor, outputs Total Render time if DEBUG>0
00057      */
00058     function __destruct() {
00059         if (DEBUG > 0) {
00060             kataDebugOutput('Total Render Time (including Models) ' . (microtime(true) - $this->starttime) . ' secs');
00061             kataDebugOutput('Memory used ' . number_format(memory_get_usage(true)) . ' bytes');
00062             kataDebugOutput('Parameters ' . print_R($this->params, true));
00063             if (function_exists('xdebug_get_profiler_filename')) {
00064                 $fn = xdebug_get_profiler_filename();
00065                 if (false !== $fn) {
00066                     kataDebugOutput('profilefile:' . $fn);
00067                 }
00068             }
00069             kataDebugOutput('Loaded classes: ' . implode(' ', array_keys(classRegistry :: getLoadedClasses())));
00070         }
00071     }
00072 
00073     private $forbiddenActions = array(
00074         'dispatch'=>1,
00075         'render'=>1,
00076         'renderView'=>1,
00077         'renderCachedHtml'=>1,
00078         'redirect'=>1,
00079         'set'=>1,
00080         'setRef'=>1,
00081         'setPageTitle'=>1,
00082         'log'=>1,
00083     );
00084 
00085     /**
00086      * start the actual mvc-machinery
00087      * 1. constructs all needed params by calling constructParams
00088      * 2. loads the controller
00089      * 3. sets all needed variables of the controller
00090      * 4. calls constructClasses of the controller, which in turn constructs all needed models and components
00091      * 5. render the actual view and layout (if autoRender is true)
00092      * 6. return the output
00093      * @param string $url raw url string passed to the array (eg. /main/index/foo/bar)
00094      */
00095     final function dispatch($url, $routes = null) {
00096         $this->constructParams($url, $routes);
00097 
00098         try {
00099             $lowername = strtolower($this->params['controller']);
00100 
00101             if ('app' == $lowername) {
00102                 $this->fourohfour();
00103                 return;
00104             }
00105 
00106             //cache-controller? handle internally
00107             if (isset($this->params['action'][0]) && ($this->params['action'][0]=='_') && (substr($this->params['action'],0,6) == '_cache')) {
00108                 $this->handleCachedFiles($lowername, substr($this->params['action'], 7));
00109             }
00110             
00111             // load controller and check if action exists
00112             require_once LIB.'controller.php';
00113             if (file_exists(ROOT . 'controllers' . DS . $lowername . '_controller.php')) {
00114                 require_once ROOT . 'controllers' . DS . $lowername . '_controller.php';
00115             } else {
00116                 if (file_exists(LIB . 'controllers' . DS . $lowername . '_controller.php')) {
00117                     require_once LIB . 'controllers' . DS . $lowername . '_controller.php';
00118                 } else {
00119                     if (empty ($this->params['action'])) {
00120                         $this->params['action'] = 'index';
00121                     }
00122 
00123                     $c = $this->constructController('AppController');
00124                     $c->beforeAction();
00125                     if ($c->before404()) {
00126                         $this->fourohfour();
00127                     }
00128                     return '';
00129                 }
00130             }
00131 
00132             $classname = ucfirst($lowername) . 'Controller';
00133             $c = $this->constructController($classname);
00134 
00135             if (!empty ($this->params['isAjax'])) {
00136                 $c->layout = null;
00137             }
00138 
00139             $c->beforeAction();
00140 
00141             if (!is_callable(array (
00142                     $c,
00143                     $this->params['action']
00144                     )) || ($this->params['action'][0] == '_')
00145                     || isset($this->forbiddenActions[$this->params['action']])) {
00146                 if ($c->before404()) {
00147                     $this->fourohfour();
00148                     return;
00149                 }
00150             } else {
00151                 $c->dispatch();
00152 
00153                 if ($c->autoRender) {
00154                     $c->render($this->params['action']);
00155                 }
00156             }
00157         } catch (Exception $e) {
00158             $basePath = $this->constructBasePath();
00159             if (file_exists(ROOT . "views" . DS . "layouts" . DS . "error.thtml")) {
00160                 include ROOT . "views" . DS . "layouts" . DS . "error.thtml";
00161             } else {
00162                 include LIB . "views" . DS . "layouts" . DS . "error.thtml";
00163             }
00164             return '';
00165         }
00166 
00167         return $c->output;
00168     }
00169 
00170     function fourohfour() {
00171         $basePath = $this->constructBasePath();
00172         if (file_exists(ROOT . "views" . DS . "layouts" . DS . "404.thtml")) {
00173             include ROOT . "views" . DS . "layouts" . DS . "404.thtml";
00174         } else {
00175             include LIB . "views" . DS . "layouts" . DS . "404.thtml";
00176         }
00177     }

00180     private function constructController($classname) {
00181             $c = new $classname;
00182             $this->controller = $c;
00183 
00184             if (empty ($this->params['action'])) {
00185                 $this->params['action'] = $c->defaultAction;
00186             }
00187             $c->basePath = $this->constructBasePath();
00188             $c->base = $this->constructBaseUrl();
00189             $c->webroot = $c->base . 'webroot/';
00190             $c->params = & $this->params;
00191             $c->action = $this->params['action'];
00192 
00193             $c->_constructClasses();
00194 
00195             return $c;
00196     }
00197 
00198     /**
00199      * extract,clean and dequote any given get/post-parameters
00200      * find out which controller and view we should use
00201      * @param string $url raw url (see dispatch())
00202      */
00203     private function constructParams($url, $routes = null) {
00204         //do we have routes?
00205         if (!empty ($routes) && is_array($routes)) {
00206             krsort($routes);
00207             if (!empty($routes[$url])) {
00208                 $url = $routes[$url];
00209             } else {
00210                 foreach ($routes as $old => $new) {
00211 //                  if (($old != '') && ($old.'/' == substr($url, 0, strlen($old.'/')))) {
00212                     if (($old != '') && ($old == substr($url, 0, strlen($old)))) {
00213                         $url = $new . substr($url, strlen($old));
00214                         break;
00215                     }
00216                 }//foreach
00217             }//!empty
00218 
00219             // does route-target have a query-string? parse it
00220             $x = strpos($url,'?');
00221             if (false !== $x) {
00222                 parse_str(substr($url,$x+1),$result);
00223                 $_GET = array_merge($_GET,$result);
00224                 $url = substr($url,0,$x-1);
00225             }
00226         }
00227 
00228         $paramList = explode('/', $url);
00229 
00230         if (isset ($paramList[0]) && ($paramList[0]) == 'ajax') {
00231             array_shift($paramList);
00232             $this->params['isAjax'] = 1;
00233         } else {
00234             $this->params['isAjax'] = 0;
00235         }
00236 
00237         $controller = "main";
00238         if (isset ($paramList[0]) && !empty ($paramList[0])) {
00239             $controller = strtolower(array_shift($paramList));
00240         }
00241 
00242         $action = '';
00243         if (isset ($paramList[0]) && !empty ($paramList[0])) {
00244             $action = strtolower(array_shift($paramList));
00245         } else {
00246             if (isset ($paramList[0])) {
00247                 unset ($paramList[0]);
00248             }
00249         }
00250 
00251         $this->params['pass'] = $paramList;
00252 
00253         $kataUrl = is($_GET['kata'], '');
00254         unset ($_GET['kata']);
00255         if (!empty ($_GET)) {
00256             if (ini_get('magic_quotes_gpc') == 1) {
00257                 $this->params['url'] = stripslashes_deep($_GET);
00258             } else {
00259                 $this->params['url'] = $_GET;
00260             }
00261         }
00262         $this->params['callUrl'] = $kataUrl;
00263 
00264         if (!empty ($_POST)) {
00265             if (ini_get('magic_quotes_gpc') == 1) {
00266                 $this->params['form'] = stripslashes_deep($_POST);
00267             } else {
00268                 $this->params['form'] = $_POST;
00269             }
00270         }
00271 
00272         $this->params['controller'] = $controller;
00273         $this->params['action'] = $action;
00274     }
00275 
00276     /**
00277      * construct the url path under which this framework can be called from the browser. adds / at the end
00278      * @return string
00279      */
00280     private function constructBasePath() {
00281         $base = dirname(dirname(env('PHP_SELF')));
00282         if (substr($base, -1, 1) == '\\') { //XAMMP
00283             $base = substr($base, 0, -1);
00284         }
00285         if (substr($base, -1, 1) != '/') {
00286             $base .= '/';
00287         }
00288         return $base;
00289     }
00290 
00291     /**
00292      * tries to construct the base url under which this framework can be called from the browser. adds a "/" at the end
00293      */
00294     private function constructBaseUrl() {
00295         return 'http' . (env('HTTPS') != '' ? 's' : '') . '://' .
00296                 env('SERVER_NAME') . (env('SERVER_PORT') != '80' ? (':' . env('SERVER_PORT')) : '') .
00297                 $this->constructBasePath();
00298     }
00299 
00300     private function handleCachedFiles($what, $version) {
00301         $filename = KATATMP . 'cache' . DS . $what. '.cache.' . basename($version);
00302         if (file_exists($filename)) {
00303             if (DEBUG>=3) {
00304                 header('Expires: ' . gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s', time() - HOUR). ' GMT');
00305             } else {
00306                 header('Expires: ' . gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s', time() + (60 * WEEK)) . ' GMT');
00307             }
00308 
00309             switch ($what) {
00310                 case 'css' :
00311                     header('Content-Type: text/css');
00312                     break;
00313                 case 'js' :
00314                     header('Content-Type: text/javascript');
00315                     break;
00316             }
00317 
00318             readfile($filename);
00319             die;
00320         }
00321 
00322         $this->fourohfour();
00323     }
